name: Lame-Boy 0.1 Floppy Bug
description:
Quick fixes:

*Hitting esc should show cursor again*

*Zoom in with google chrome*

Really bad FB clone 

Floppy bug controls:

Keyboard                              Controller

Enter - Jump                       A button-Jump

  Menu navigation

                         Arrow Keys                             Analog Stick                             

Created for the GBJAM8 wherein the restrictions are 4 colors max on screen at a time, and a viewport size or aspect ratio of the original gameboy (160x144)

If you have  a hard time seeing fullscreen may not work XD but zooming in with google chrome seems to work. 

This game was basically just what I learned over the past few days, nothing special. This includes but is not limited to scrolling backrounds, player collision stuffs, re-learning how to do text and numbers and such as well as controller stuff. Figuring out music, a little better sprite and color management, and that just when you think you're all done and ready to publish... You may or may not have a couple hours more work to put into it to get it even working properly. But don't give up! Thats the biggest thing I learned. Push through and you'll be glad you did. 

I plan on updating this perhaps periodically just with little enhancements here and there but the LameBoy will be shelved until the next GBJAM I decide to partake in.
